Articles.Content:
So... After reinstalling I still having this issue. It happens when I am building something after a while, not with new vessels. But the vessel which gets "bugged" gets bugged even after restarting the game.... In flight no problem, but in editor I get all lag and low fps whenever I click ANY part and lots of these:

I got the same before, I reinstalled everything from scratch using CKAN... the same issue with new save....

Edited August 17, 2019 by Agustin
Which mods are you using? I get the same logspam pretty regularly
